description:
Ski with confidence, versatility, and comfort while elevating your skiing journey to new heights. The 4-Quattro ski boot is a true hybrid, letting you embark on your chosen adventure of the day without the hassle of swapping out your boots. A plant-based Griamid shell and cuff is reinforced by four buckles and a Booster strap, providing you with progressive flex in any snow condition.

  • Grilamid Bio® shell with an over-injected Carbon Grilamid® LFT insert
  • Added carbon in the core to increase torsional rigidity
  • Pebax cuff provides consistent stiffness across a range of temperatures
  • Alpine Axial Hybrid Construction for easy entry and a secure fit
  • Intuition® Pro Flex liner is thermoformable for a custom fit
  • Speedlock XT ski/walk mechanism offers friction-free touring efficiency with downhill performance
  • 4 micro-adjustable buckles with Booster® Active Power Strap offers a precise fit
  • PRESA® sole has a smooth rubber toe and lugged rubber profile to reduce snow build up and provide grip
  • Flex index is 130
name: Scarpa 4-Quattro XT Ski Boots - Unisex
